body:
SELECT   a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0004]/value as dv_text,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_1.v0]/items[at0001]/value as dv_coded_text,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_1.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_2.v0]/items[at0001]/value as dv_quantity,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_1.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_2.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_3.v0]/items[at0001]/value as dv_proportion,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_1.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_2.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_3.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_4.v0]/items[at0001]/value as dv_count,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_1.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_2.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_3.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_4.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_5.v0]/items[at0001]/value as dv_date_time,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_1.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_2.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_3.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_4.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_5.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_6.v0]/items[at0001]/value as dv_time,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_1.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_2.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_3.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_4.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_5.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_6.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_7.v0]/items[at0001]/value as dv_date,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_1.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_2.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_3.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_4.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_5.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_6.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_7.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_8.v0]/items[at0001]/value as dv_ordinal,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_1.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_2.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_3.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_4.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_5.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_6.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_7.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_8.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_9.v0]/items[at0001]/value as dv_boolean,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_1.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_2.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_3.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_4.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_5.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_6.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_7.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_8.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_9.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_10.v0]/items[at0001]/value as dv_identifier,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_1.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_2.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_3.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_4.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_5.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_6.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_7.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_8.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_9.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_10.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.cluster_11.v0]/items[at0001]/value as dv_duration
        FROM EHR e CONTAINS COMPOSITION c
  CONTAINS (OBSERVATION a[openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.all_12_data_types_multiple_clusters.v0])
            LIMIT 1
        ORDER BY c /context/start_time/ value DESC
